description: Welcome to Unit 18 at Pacific Court â€” the largest end-unit townhome in the complex with 1,650+ sqft of living space. This 4-bed, 4-bath home features a newly renovated kitchen, brand-new flooring, and a bright, open main level. Upstairs offers well-appointed bedrooms, including a spacious primary suite. Enjoy the convenience of a double side-by-side garage for secure parking and storage. Centrally located just minutes to shops, schools, parks, transit, and a 10-minute walk to the future SkyTrain station. A rare find with room for the whole family.
